channel.title: 0.9.7 Patch Notes
channel.description:
## General: * Added a brush size slider to the deathnote. * Added a clear confirmation to the deathnote.
## Herbalist: * Removed Unearth. * Changed Drug. Trick a player into believing they were attacked and healed. Has 3 uses. * Added Defile - If targeted player dies tonight, they will appear as chosen class. Has 3 uses.
## Physician: * Exhume is now a private message the Physician receives.
## Bug Fixes: * Fixed Will-o-Wisp? * Fixed Bewilder. * Some others.

item.title: 0.9.7 Patch Notes
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
Good changes to Physician and Herbalist, now Herbalist is pretty dangerous lol

Read full topic

item.title: 0.9.7 Patch Notes
item.dc:creator: Ellie
item.description:
General:

  • Added a brush size slider to the deathnote.
  • Added a clear confirmation to the deathnote.

Herbalist:

  • Removed Unearth.
  • Changed Drug. Trick a player into believing they were attacked and healed. Has 3 uses.
  • Added Defile - If targeted player dies tonight, they will appear as chosen class. Has 3 uses.

Physician:

  • Exhume is now a private message the Physician receives.

Bug Fixes:

  • Fixed Will-o-Wisp?
  • Fixed Bewilder.
  • Some others.

Read full topic
